summary: A documentary on rock band Titãs covering more than 20 years of their successful career. The film is composed by videos made by the band itself during several different tours and Tv footage... See full summary »
cast: Arnaldo Antunes|Tony Bellotto|Sérgio Britto|Hebe Camargo|Roberto Carlos|Jimmy Cliff|Édson Cury|Jack Endino|Marcelo Fromer|Charles Gavin|Rita Lee|Gugu Liberato|Liminha|Malu Mader|Branco Mello|Paulo Miklos|Marisa Monte|Bárbara Paz|Ciro Pessoa|Edgard Piccoli|Jânio Quadros|Nando Reis|Thomas Roth|Silvio Santos|Wilson Simonal|Herbert Vianna|Caco Barcellos
director: Directors: Oscar Rodrigues Alves, Branco Mello
title: Titãs: A Vida Até Parece uma Festa
